wpPost.title: Wrapping up 2022 with our biggest Company Trip ever!

seo.title: Wrapping up 2022 with our biggest Company Trip ever! - FLS
seo.metaDesc: Joined by 150 leaders and staff from five countries, the trip gave us all the opportunity to celebrate accomplishments and head for an even better 2023.
seo.opengraphTitle: Wrapping up 2022 with our biggest Company Trip ever! - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: Joined by 150 leaders and staff from five countries, the trip gave us all the opportunity to celebrate accomplishments and head for an even better 2023.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: We just wrapped up our brilliant 2022 with our biggest and coolest end-of-year company trip!

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Joined by 150 leaders and staff from five countries, the trip gave us all the opportunity to celebrate shared accomplishments, strengthen our relationships and head for an even better 2023.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Our thanks to our teams from FLS Thailand, FLS Vietnam, FLS India, FLS Singapore and FLS Indonesia for being part of this wonderful experience.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Click through to relive some of our most memorable moments in Khao Yai, UNESCO’s World Heritage Site.
